name: DescribeQuickActionResult

fields.name: canvasapplicationname
fields.description: The name of the Canvas application invoked by the custom action.

fields.name: colors
fields.description: Array of color information. Each color is associated with a theme.

fields.name: contextsobjecttype
fields.description: The object used for the action. Was getsourceSobjectType() in API version 29.0 and earlier.

fields.name: defaultvalues
fields.description: The action’s default values.

fields.name: flowdevname
fields.description: If the custom action invokes a flow, the fully qualified name of the flow.

fields.name: flowrecordidvar
fields.description: If the custom action invokes a flow, the input variable that the custom action passes the record’s ID to.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height in pixels of the action pane.

fields.name: iconname
fields.description: The name of the icon used for the action. If a custom icon is not used, this value isn’t set.

fields.name: icons
fields.description: Array of icons. Each icon is associated with a theme.

fields.name: iconurl
fields.description: The URL of the icon used for the action. This icon URL corresponds to the 32x32 icon used for the current Salesforce theme, introduced in Spring ’10, or the custom icon, if there is one.

fields.name: layout
fields.description: The section of the layout where the action resides.

fields.name: lightningcomponentbundleid
fields.description: If the custom action invokes a Lightning component, the ID of the Lightning component bundle to which the component belongs.

fields.name: lightningcomponentbundlename
fields.description: If the custom action invokes a Lightning component, the name of the Lightning component bundle to which the component belongs.

fields.name: lightningcomponentqualifiedname
fields.description: The fully qualified name of the Lightning component invoked by the custom action.

fields.name: miniiconurl
fields.description: The icon’s URL. This icon URL corresponds to the 16x16 icon used for the current Salesforce theme, introduced in Spring ’10, or the custom icon, if there is one.

fields.name: showquickactionlcheader
fields.description: Indicates whether  the Lightning component quick action header and footer are shown. If false, then both the header containing the quick action title and the footer containing the Save and Cancel buttons aren’t displayed.

fields.name: showquickactionvfheader
fields.description: Indicates whether  the Visualforce quick action header and footer should be shown. If false, then both the header containing the quick action title and the footer containing the Save and Cancel buttons aren’t displayed.

fields.name: targetparentfield
fields.description: The parent object type of the action. Links the target object to the parent object. For example, the value is Account if the target object is Contact and the parent object is Account.

fields.name: targetrecordtypeid
fields.description: The record type of the target record.

fields.name: targetsobjecttype
fields.description: The action’s target object type.

fields.name: visualforcepagename
fields.description: The name of the Visualforce page associated with the custom action.

fields.name: visualforcepageurl
fields.description: The URL of the Visualforce page associated with the action.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width in pixels of the action pane, for custom actions that call Visualforce pages, Canvas apps, or Lightning components.

methods.name: getActionEnumOrId
methods.description: Returns the unique ID for the action. If the action doesn’t have an ID, its API name is used.

methods.name: getCanvasApplicationName
methods.description: Returns the name of the Canvas application, if used.

methods.name: getColors
methods.description: Returns an array of color information. Each color is associated with a theme.

methods.name: getContextSobjectType
methods.description: Returns the object used for the action. Replaces getsourceSobjectType() in API version 30.0 and later.

methods.name: getDefaultValues
methods.description: Returns the default values for a action.

methods.name: getFlowDevName
methods.description: If the custom action invokes a flow, returns the fully qualified name of the flow invoked by the custom action.

methods.name: getFlowRecordIdVar
methods.description: If the custom action invokes a flow, returns the input variable that the custom action passes the record’s ID to.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.description: Returns the height in pixels of the action pane.

methods.name: getIconName
methods.description: Returns the actions’ icon name.

methods.name: getIconUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL of the 32x32 icon used for the action.

methods.name: getIcons
methods.description: Returns a list of Schema.DescribeIconResult objects that describe colors used in a tab.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the action label.

methods.name: getLayout
methods.description: Returns the layout sections that comprise an action.

methods.name: getLightningComponentBundleId
methods.description: If the custom action invokes a Lightning component, returns the ID of the Lightning component bundle to which the component belongs.

methods.name: getLightningComponentBundleName
methods.description: If the custom action invokes a Lightning component, returns the name of the Lightning component bundle to which the component belongs.

methods.name: getLightningComponentQualifiedName
methods.description: If the custom action invokes a Lightning component, returns the fully qualified name of the Lightning component invoked by the custom action.

methods.name: getMiniIconUrl
methods.description: Returns the 16x16 icon URL.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the action name.

methods.name: getShowQuickActionLcHeader
methods.description: Returns an indication of whether  the Lightning component quick action header and footer are shown.

methods.name: getShowQuickActionVfHeader
methods.description: Returns an indication of whether  the Visualforce quick action header and footer should be shown.

methods.name: getSourceSobjectType
methods.description: Returns the object type used for the action.

methods.name: getTargetParentField
methods.description: Returns the parent object’s type for the action.

methods.name: getTargetRecordTypeId
methods.description: Returns the record type of the targeted record.

methods.name: getTargetSobjectType
methods.description: Returns the action’s target object type.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns a create or custom Visualforce action.

methods.name: getVisualforcePageName
methods.description: If Visualforce is used, returns the name of the associated page for the action.

methods.name: getVisualforcePageUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL of the Visualforce page associated with the action.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: If a custom action is created, returns the width in pixels of the action pane.

description: Contains describe metadata information for a quick action.
